How to complete Section 4: Care of the woman
This section is to facilitate decision-making for consistent, intermittent monitoring of the 
woman’s well-being. The woman’s health and well-being are monitored on the LCG by 
regular observation of the pulse, blood pressure, temperature and urine (see Table 5).
